param.name: debug_release
param.spec: select label_3='release' display='normal' description='debug_release switch' data_1='-debug' label_1='debug' data_3=''

parameters.param:
#!/bin/bash echo "##teamcity[buildNumber '%dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.number%']" echo Qt5 echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.number% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQt5git% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQt5git%
echo Qt Wayland echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.build.number% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtwaylandGit% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtwaylandGit%
echo QtIVI echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.build.number% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtiviGit% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtiviGit%
echo Qt Application Manager echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.build.number% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtapplicationmanagerGit% echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtapplicationmanagerGit%
#!/bin/bash mkdir -p root/DEBIAN for i in *.tar.gz;do tar xf "$i" -C ./root done

export VNUMBER=`echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.number%|sed 's/^v//'` export BRANCH=`echo %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQt5git%|awk -F/ '{print $NF}'` cat << EOF > root/DEBIAN/control Package: qt-${BRANCH} Version: $VNUMBER Architecture: amd64 Maintainer: Nikolay Zamotaev Installed-Size: `du -sk root|awk '{print $1}'` Depends: libc6 (>= 2.15), libxcb-xinerama0-dev, libx11-xcb-dev, libglu1-mesa-dev, libxrender-dev, libxi-dev, libssl-dev, libxcursor-dev, libxcomposite-dev, libxdamage-dev, libxrandr-dev, libdbus-1-dev, libfontconfig1-dev, libcap-dev, libxtst-dev, libpulse-dev, libudev-dev, libpci-dev, libnss3-dev, libasound2-dev, libxss-dev, libegl1-mesa-dev, gperf, bison, libwayland-dev, libwayland-egl1-mesa, libwayland-server0, libgles2-mesa-dev, libxkbcommon-dev, cmake, zlib1g-dev, libdbus-glib-1-dev, dlt-daemon, git-core, libtag1-dev, python3-dev, python3-virtualenv, libpng-dev Section: devel Priority: optional Description: Qt5 from ${BRANCH} branch. Built with Qt5 build %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.number% hash %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQt5git% branch %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_Qt5.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQt5git% . Qt Wayland build %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.build.number% hash %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtwaylandGit% branch %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtWayland.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtwaylandGit% . QtIVI build %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.build.number% hash %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtiviGit% branch %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtIvi.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtiviGit% . Qt Application Manager build %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.build.number% hash %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtapplicationmanagerGit% branch %dep.QtAutomotive_Components_QtApplicationManager.teamcity.build.vcs.branch.QtAutomotive_Components_CodeQtIoQtQtapplicationmanagerGit% EOF dpkg -b ./root/ %system.teamcity.build.tempDir%/
